sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) Once per game session, the character may add 2 setback dice to the skill check of one NPC within extreme range.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Sense advantage</name> <number>TAL0001120</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-23 05:14:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c25cf98ddb6a8c542901de90cf96199b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-10 13:52:17</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
